English: The sun rises in the east.
Spanish: El sol sale por el este.

English: I forgot my umbrella at home.
Spanish: Olvidé mi paraguas en casa.

English: She enjoys reading mystery novels.
Spanish: A ella le gusta leer novelas de misterio.

English: We are planning a trip to Spain next summer.
Spanish: Estamos planeando un viaje a España el próximo verano.

English: The coffee tastes better in the morning.
Spanish: El café sabe mejor por la mañana.

English: My brother plays the guitar very well.
Spanish: Mi hermano toca la guitarra muy bien.

English: There are seven days in a week.
Spanish: Hay siete días en una semana.

English: Please close the window before you leave.
Spanish: Por favor, cierra la ventana antes de irte.

English: The museum opens at ten o’clock.
Spanish: El museo abre a las diez en punto.

English: She speaks three languages fluently.
Spanish: Ella habla tres idiomas con fluidez.

English: Our dog loves running in the park.
Spanish: A nuestro perro le encanta correr en el parque.

English: I need to buy milk and bread.
Spanish: Necesito comprar leche y pan.

English: He is afraid of flying in airplanes.
Spanish: Él tiene miedo de volar en aviones.

English: We watched a movie together last night.
Spanish: Vimos una película juntos anoche.

English: The flowers in the garden are blooming.
Spanish: Las flores del jardín están floreciendo.

English: My parents celebrate their anniversary in June.
Spanish: Mis padres celebran su aniversario en junio.

English: The train arrives every fifteen minutes.
Spanish: El tren llega cada quince minutos.

English: She wore a beautiful red dress to the party.
Spanish: Ella llevó un hermoso vestido rojo a la fiesta.

English: I have never visited New York City.
Spanish: Nunca he visitado la ciudad de Nueva York.

English: The children are playing hide and seek.
Spanish: Los niños están jugando al escondite.

English: He always forgets to water the plants.
Spanish: Él siempre olvida regar las plantas.

English: The library is quiet and peaceful.
Spanish: La biblioteca es tranquila y apacible.

English: We met at the new Italian restaurant downtown.
Spanish: Nos conocimos en el nuevo restaurante italiano del centro.

English: She is studying to become a doctor.
Spanish: Ella está estudiando para ser doctora.

English: The weather is getting colder every day.
Spanish: El clima está volviéndose más frío cada día.

English: I like to listen to music while I work.
Spanish: Me gusta escuchar música mientras trabajo.

English: He bought a gift for his grandmother.
Spanish: Él compró un regalo para su abuela.

English: The mountain view is breathtaking.
Spanish: La vista de la montaña es impresionante.

English: We need to finish the project by Friday.
Spanish: Necesitamos terminar el proyecto para el viernes.

English: She forgot her keys in the car.
Spanish: Ella olvidó sus llaves en el coche.

English: The soup is too hot to eat right now.
Spanish: La sopa está demasiado caliente para comer ahora.

English: I usually go jogging in the evening.
Spanish: Normalmente salgo a correr por la tarde.

English: Our class starts at eight o’clock in the morning.
Spanish: Nuestra clase empieza a las ocho de la mañana.

English: He enjoys painting landscapes in his free time.
Spanish: A él le gusta pintar paisajes en su tiempo libre.

English: The baby fell asleep in her mother’s arms.
Spanish: La bebé se durmió en los brazos de su madre.

English: We celebrated his birthday with a surprise party.
Spanish: Celebramos su cumpleaños con una fiesta sorpresa.

English: She always brings her lunch from home.
Spanish: Ella siempre trae su almuerzo de casa.

English: The river flows through the center of the city.
Spanish: El río pasa por el centro de la ciudad.

English: I am learning how to cook Italian food.
Spanish: Estoy aprendiendo a cocinar comida italiana.

English: He was late because of heavy traffic.
Spanish: Llegó tarde por el tráfico pesado.

English: The bookstore has a wide selection of novels.
Spanish: La librería tiene una gran selección de novelas.

English: We enjoyed the concert last weekend.
Spanish: Disfrutamos el concierto el fin de semana pasado.

English: She is allergic to peanuts and shellfish.
Spanish: Ella es alérgica a los cacahuetes y los mariscos.

English: The teacher explained the lesson very clearly.
Spanish: El profesor explicó la lección muy claramente.

English: I need to charge my phone before we leave.
Spanish: Necesito cargar mi teléfono antes de salir.

English: They are building a new bridge over the river.
Spanish: Están construyendo un nuevo puente sobre el río.

English: The cake was delicious and everyone loved it.
Spanish: El pastel estaba delicioso y a todos les encantó.

English: We took many pictures during our vacation.
Spanish: Tomamos muchas fotos durante nuestras vacaciones.

English: She wants to learn how to play chess.
Spanish: Ella quiere aprender a jugar ajedrez.

English: The stars are shining brightly tonight.
Spanish: Las estrellas brillan intensamente esta noche.
